title: Some people!!!
body:
What is it with people these days. They tell you their grade but if you beat them they call BS on you.
And yes my game was not great but with a trolling Nunu and Ziggs early game we were lucky to win.

Also on the grade note, these two trolls pointed out that unless you get the trinket up-graded, you can't obtain a S+ rank and yet I got one. Are they right and did Riot stuff up again or did I actually earn it?

Screen capture also taken for for the fact it's my first S+

replies.body: That moment "noob" is taken at all seriously, and made the focal point of an entire paragraph addressing the actual point of the thread.

NIce work but your build isnt great

unless this is a custom buold that you really enjoy,get 

stalkers blade/skirmishers sabre-devourer
sunfires cape
BOTRK
trinity force
Ravenous hydra
black cleaver

i dont get boots because her W gives a speed boost,and it is best to geta little magic damage( trinty) as she deals both physical and magic damage

this build actually gives you alot of sustain/tankiness and burst damage

hope you enjoy :)

So what ? Ziggs thought the highest you could get was an S, he was misinformed so you call him a noob?

Then come here looking for what?

> [{quoted}](name=Eimer Troll,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=suQGHEjf,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-08-13T20:29:47.347+0000)
>
> So what ? Ziggs thought the highest you could get was an S, he was misinformed so you call him a noob?
> 
> Then come here looking for what?

He tried to make op look stupid :/

My first S+ was as a support, practically on the first day of release since I got so excited. My trinket wasn't upgraded, even at the role where it's extremely important to. Ranking seems to only calculate scores in the match history pages, not builds, so as long as adc's have farm, jg/supports have wards down, etc.

Well done on the S+
I've gotten one too on Zed (Luv u bby <3)
